member.name: T:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings
member.summary: Settings for specifying NuGet packages.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Prerelease
member.summary: Specifies that prerelease packages are allowed.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Unlisted
member.summary: Specifies that unlisted packages are allowed.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Exclusive
member.summary: Indicates that only the specified package source(s) should be used to find the package.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version of the package to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Source
member.summary: Specifies the package source(s) to get the package from.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.NuGetSettings.Package
member.summary: The package to install.

summary.para:
In order to use the commands for this alias, include the following in your build.cake file to download and install from NuGet.org, or specify the ToolPath within the WyamSettings class:
#addin "nuget:?package=Cake.Wyam" #tool "nuget:?package=Wyam"

member.name: M:Cake.Wyam.WyamAliases.Wyam(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: Runs Wyam using the specified settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Wyam.WyamAliases.Wyam(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings)
member.summary: Runs Wyam using the specified settings.

member.name: T:Cake.Wyam.WyamRunner
member.summary: The Wyam Runner used to execute the Wyam Executable

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cake.Wyam.WyamRunner.Run(Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings)
member.summary: Publishes a Vsce package from the provided settings.

member.name: M:Cake.Wyam.WyamRunner.GetToolName
member.summary: Gets the name of the tool.

member.name: M:Cake.Wyam.WyamRunner.GetToolExecutableNames
member.summary: Gets the possible names of the tool executable.

member.name: T:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Watch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable watching of input folder for changes to files.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Attach
member.summary: Pauses execution while waiting for a debugger to attach.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Preview
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable previewing of the generated content in built in web server.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.PreviewPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the port number to use for previewing.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.PreviewForceExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable forcing of using file extensions.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.PreviewVirtualDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the virtual directory to use for the preview server.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.PreviewRoot
member.summary: The path to the root of the preview server, if not the output folder.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.InputPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the input paths that should be used while running Wyam.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the output path that should be used while running Wyam.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.ConfigurationFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the configuration file that should be used while running Wyam.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.UpdatePackages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable updating of packages.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.UseLocalPackages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use a local NuGet packages folder.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.UseGlobalSources
member.summary: Toggles the use of the global NuGet sources.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.PackagesPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the packages path to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.OutputScript
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to output the script at end of execution.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.VerifyConfig
member.summary: Compile the configuration but do not execute.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.NoClean
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prevent cleaning of the output path on each execution if true.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.NoCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to turn off the caching mechanism on all modules if true.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run in verbose mode.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets metadata settings.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.LogFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the Wyam log file.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.RootPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the The folder (or config file) to use as the root.
member.remarks: Default is the current working directory

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.NuGetPackages
member.summary: Adds NuGet packages (downloading and installing them if needed).

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.NuGetSources
member.summary: Specifies additional package sources to use.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Assemblies
member.summary: Adds references to multiple assemblies by name, file name, or globbing patterns.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Recipe
member.summary: Gets or sets the recipe.

member.name: P:Cake.Wyam.WyamSettings.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme.
